task: Develop a basic 'Ninja Gaiden' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Cascades'.
name: Shadow Cascades

branding_data.short_description: Shadow Cascades is a thrilling action-adventure game where players control a ninja navigating cascading environments filled with enemies and obstacles.
branding_data.detailed_description: Shadow Cascades is an action-packed game inspired by classic 'Ninja Gaiden' mechanics. Players assume the role of a skilled ninja warrior, tasked with overcoming a series of challenging levels that cascade into one another. Each level features a dynamic environment that evolves as players progress, introducing new enemies, traps, and puzzles. The game emphasizes fluid movement and strategic combat, requiring players to master their ninja skills to survive. The cascading level design creates a unique gameplay experience, where the outcome of one level influences the next, adding depth and complexity to the adventure. With stunning visuals and a gripping soundtrack, Shadow Cascades immerses players in a world of stealth, agility, and relentless action.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
